title: Old Newspaper Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120504012201im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wdt_6000.jpg)

This image was a vector recreation of a maybe late 1800's early 1900's font?  
Anyone know what it is, or where I can find it?
author: strikemike2k

comments.content:
There are a number of Old English digital versions, but the one in the [Monotype Scripts 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20120504012201/http:/www.fonts.com/FindFonts/Detail.htm?pid=242911&/cgi-bin/MsmGo.exe?grab_id=0&page_id=45116&query=%22OLD%22&SCOPE=Fonts) package seems closest for more letters. The W and y are disconnects in some of the others "Old English" fonts.

- Mike Yanega
